{"id":901062369,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1676825372,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/901062369/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        // handling overflow case\n        if (dividend == INT_MIN && divisor == -1) {\n            return INT_MAX;\n        }\n\n        long dvd = labs(dividend), dvs = labs(divisor), ans = 0;\n        // finding the sign\n        int sign = dividend > 0 ^ divisor > 0 ? -1 : 1;\n        while (dvd >= dvs) {\n            long temp = dvs, m = 1;\n            while (temp << 1 <= dvd) {\n                temp <<= 1;\n                m <<= 1;\n            }\n            dvd -= temp;\n            ans += m;\n        }\n        \n        return sign * ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false}
